noun.definition: The name of a book, movie, article, or other work
noun.example: The title of the book is written on the cover.

noun.definition: A formal name or rank given to a person
noun.example: She earned the title of professor.

verb.definition: To give a name or title to something
verb.example: He titled his painting after his hometown.

usage_examples: The article was titled carefully to attract readers.
